item.description:
Let's see this at the Jordan's IMAX theater in Natick. 9:30 showtime. We'll get a bite to eat or a drink, before at the Kelly's roast beef next door. Make sure you get your tickets in advance online! ..

Peter Wayland is out to change the world!

....

Alien is one of the best horror films created.   Director Ridley Scott returns the story in this prequel.

....

The film is described as provocative, mixing philosophical questions and action.  Ridley Scott: "the film will be really tough, really nasty. It's the dark side of the moon. We are talking about gods and engineers. Engineers of space. And were the aliens designed as a form of biological warfare? Or biology that would go in and clean up a planet?"

 

 

....

The film stars the Swedish actress Noomi  Rapace, Michael Fassbinder (Magneto, in X-Men First Class), Guy Pearce (star of Memento) and Charlize Theron (Young Adult, Snow White & The Huntsman).
item.how_to_find_us: We'll see the 9:30 show. We'll meet at the Kelly's roast beef next to the Jordan's furniture.
item.name: Prometheus: Stolen from the Gods... (IMAX)
